Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The paragraph does not mention any specific disease. It only mentions that the disease onset occurs in those families harboring causative mutations, but it does not specify which disease or diseases are involved.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| Disease(s) caused by causative mutations |

The paragraph mentions "disease(s)" caused by "causative mutations," but it does not specify which disease or diseases are involved. Therefore, the entity should be listed as "Disease(s) caused by causative mutations."
